snippet: We talked to a business owner in Oklahoma several years ago who was looking for an exit strategy. When we asked about the contracts the company had in place, we were told that there were none; business was done with a handshake.
abstract: We talked to a business owner in Oklahoma several years ago who was looking for an exit strategy. When we asked about the contracts the company had in place, we were told that there were none; business was done with a handshake.

headline.main: Is There Still a Place in Business for a Handshake Deal?
